Event.MetaKeywords: M S Subbulakshmi 95th Birthday Celebrations Concert in London
Event.MetaDescription: Concert in London to mark the 95th Birthday of M S Subbulakshmi
Event.Address: 78 Church Road, Manor Park, London E12 6AF
Event.Maindescription:
Dr. MS Subbulakshmi 95th Birthday Celebrations

To mark the To mark the 95th Birthday of Dr. MS Subbulakshmi, London Sri Murugan temple has organised a music concert by Smt. Manorama Prasad who is is known for her traditional and technical rendering. Her powerful voice has adorned her inborn gift of rendering pure music in an inimitable way. The control she has on the ragas and very complicated talas are something every music listener will appreciate and will be a true remembrance of Dr. MS.

Event

Vocal : Smt Manorama Prasad
Violin : Dr. Jyotsna Srikanth
Mridangam : Somasundaram Desigar

Admission : FREE !
PS : Request you to be on time to enjoy the music fully

]]>
